text: Aloe namibensis is a species of plant in the genus Aloe. It is endemic to Namibia. Its natural habitat is rocky areas. It is threatened by habitat loss. == References == * Loots, S. 2004. Aloe namibensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Aloe namibensis
